name: D'Crossier - Golden Blend Refinados - Magnificos
additionalNotes: D'Crossier Cigars derived its name from the surname of the grandfather of company president, Isaias Santana Diaz. He was passionate about cigars and this passion of him is inherited by his grandson who established his cigar company in 2006. D'Crossier cigars are unique in the cigar world due to its secret blend and are handcrafted by expert Cuban artisans in Costa Rica. Made of Nicaraguan and Dominican fillers and Costa Rica binders, these vitolas are wrapped in Ecuador or Costa Rica wrappers. These puros are full of flavors and provide rich, creamy smoke and long finish. They are available in a number of series namely Flor de D'Crossier Selection, L'Forte, Imperium Class Vintage, Presidential Collection, Golden Blend Aged 10 Years, Premium Blend among others.
